jd: From: Daniel Livingston, Smart Tech Link daniel.l@smarttechlink.com Reply to: daniel.l@smarttechlink.com Hi,We do have a priority requirement with one of our clients. Kindly review and let me know if you have any questions.Project ManagerSanta Clara, CA Must Have SkillsSkill 1 – Expert level knowledge of React and redux and experience managing projects involving these skills.Skill 2 – Translate business problems into ML/AI requirements.Skill 3 – Good knowledge on Data science tech stack (PySpark, Image Processing) • Extremely detail-oriented and organized with a hands-on approach to project management and a strong bias for action• Ability to handle multiple and high volume projects and deadlines simultaneously while maintaining excellent and accurate work• Expert level knowledge of React and redux and experience managing projects involving these skills.• Translate business problems into ML/AI requirements by collaborating with stakeholders and understanding their needs.• Conduct project scoping to define project goals, deliverables, and success criteria• Able to submit estimations based on the requirements from business• Good knowledge on Data science tech stack ( PySpark, Image Processing)• Good understanding on Agile and Waterfall methodologies• Manage stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle to ensure effective communication and alignment• Manage offshore teams, present the status to business, coordinate with stake holders to remove any impedimentsThis is an immediate requirement and needs profiles urgently. Please look for junior PM’s or Senior Leads who can do the above job.Thanks & Regards Daniel LivingstonSr Technical RecruiterDaniel.l@smarttechlink.com | www.smarttechlink.com |LinkedIn
